		Question: Where is the city of Buffalo?
		Answer:
answer: Buffalo is located in Erie County, New York, United States. It is situated on the eastern shore of Lake Erie, at the mouth of the Buffalo River and the southern end of the Niagara River. Buffalo is also part of the "sister cities" of Buffalo, New York and Fort Erie, Ontario, Canada.
